channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat build of Apache Camel 4.0 for Spring Boot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat build of Apache Camel 4.0 for Spring Boot

item.title: CVE-2024-6162|2024-07-01T10:50:42.408Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20build%20of%20apache%20camel%204.0%20for%20spring%20boot
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow. URL-encoded request path information can be broken for concurrent requests on ajp-listener, causing the wrong path to be processed and resulting in a possible denial of service.
